value.message: Permissions for updateTask are controlled solely by client-provided id without backend ownership verification, risking IDOR.
value.suggestion: Add backend-side resource ownership checks before updating tasks. Do not rely only on client-provided id.

value.message: Permissions for removeTask are controlled solely by client-provided id without backend ownership verification, risking IDOR.
value.suggestion: Add backend-side resource ownership checks before removing tasks. Do not rely only on client-provided id.
